summary: A female Nord companion who relies heavily on her shield. Still in testing phase, report any bugs you may find. Hopefully can update soon.
descriptionHtml:
A big thank you to Wowkaidlin for the screenshots that did not make me unhappy, like mine did. XP

Okay, so the concept was a companion who supports you by keeping your foes distracted. I accomplished this by making a very defensive-based fighting style, centered a lot around the shield over the axe.

I've found her to be a very useful companion for archer-type characters, as she's good at keeping your enemy in one place and soaking up a lot of damage with her shield. In battle, she tends to play a very defensive role, spending more time blocking or shield-bashing than attacking.

As mentioned, this is a work in progress and my first mod. I plan to, at some point, create a quest centered around her, rather than just "hey, babe, wanna come help me out?" Any assistance on this end would be appreciated.

As to where to find her? She's in Dragonsreach, usually hangs out off to the right of the door. Please play test her vigorously in all ways possible and get back to me with your results.

Version 0.2 is marriageable. I think. If you want to try that out, I would love you forever. If you like her, please endorse and review!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
What's in the works for Tina? 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hopefully a fully scripted acquirement quest and a loyalty quest somewhere down the road. Custom voicing is a maybe, and possibly a romance quest somewhere along the line. Something substantial, because I've always felt like just running up to someone with an amulet of Mara and yelling "HEY LET'S F**K!" was a bit too easy. 
Be patient with me as I upload other mods, I'm simply learning the ropes of the modding buisness (Again), and if I vanish for a time, it's because I'm busy with life. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recommended Mods- (Not required, simply recommended by author.)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

UNP Blessed body- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?

Amazing Follower Tweaks- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?

Changelog
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ver0.2- Fixed the "Black Face bug" by finding and adding the Facetint files. (Yup, I'm a n00b. XD)
author: Demonbane775
